en.classic_info:
This mode is Clan Generator at its most basic. The player will not be expected to manage the minutiae of Clan life.

Perfect for a relaxing game session or for focusing on storytelling.

With this mode you are the eye in the sky, watching the Clan as their story unfolds.
en.expanded_info:
A more hands-on experience. This mode has everything in Classic Mode as well as more management-focused features.

Additional features include:
- Illnesses, Injuries, and Permanent Conditions
- Herb gathering and treatment
- Fresh-kill pile and nutrition system

With this mode you'll be making the important Clan-life decisions.
en.cruel_season_info:
This mode has all the features of Expanded mode, but is significantly more difficult. If you'd like a challenge with a bit of brutality, then this mode is for you.

You heard the warnings... a Cruel Season is coming. Will you survive?

-COMING SOON-
en.menu_warning: Note: going back to main menu resets the generated cats.
en.game_mode_warning: Your Clan's game mode is permanent and cannot be changed after Clan creation.
en.quick_start_tooltip: When checked, a completely random Clan starting in Newleaf will be generated.
en.error_clan_name_space: Clan names cannot start with a space.
en.error_clan_name_duplicate: A Clan with that name already exists.
en.save_confirm: Your Clan has been created and saved!
